analysis.description:
Reentrancy in CrowdFunder.endFundraising (/unique_chucks/43/0x92610183c05372672bc86c3d9a7c94e2a6d00453.sol#487-522):

	- generateReserve() (/unique_chucks/43/0x92610183c05372672bc86c3d9a7c94e2a6d00453.sol#519)
